verbs.description: so long monte carlo vegas new park [ARG0: mgm] [V: makes] [ARG1: its debut] the park mgm the city newest resort opened wednesday offering good value for money on the often - pricey strip it replaces the monte carlo only the shell of that hotel which opened in 1996 remains after a top - to - bottom makeover metro goldwyn mayer vegas monte carlo las vegas andrew zobler park mgm
